text: visvasulu - tama toti visvasulanu vidici - satyatiraskarulanu snehituluga cesukoradu. Ala cesevariki allah to e vidhamaina sambandham ledu. Kani, vari daurjan'yaniki bhitiparulaite tappa! Allah (ayanake bhitiparulai undamani) mim'malni svayanga heccaristunnadu. Mariyu allah vaipuke mi maralimpu undi
